headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Madness Descends in Los Santos in Halloween Week
content:
The macabre and surreal continues to torment the people of Los Santos this Halloween season with Phantom Cars and Slasher-style psychos terrorizing Freemode, along with lights and objects hovering in the sky. Proceed with caution and watch your back for public menaces terrorizing your neighborhood. Plus, there's discounts on a variety of terrifying vehicles.

As if all those horrors werenâ€™t enough, there has been sightings of Psychedelic Peyote Plants. Consume them at your own risk.
